content: >who cares what the weather is outside when you have a nice cosy throw to keep you warm this easy crochet pattern is created with just one colour so you can choose whatever shade yarn you desire for your surroundings gauge 9 sts = 2½ 6 5 cm 4 row 3 double_crochet row and 1 single_crochet row = 2½ 6 5 cm in pattern the german version is here 1 1 https //web archive org/web/20150724113626/http //www redheart de/files/patterns/pdf/lw4600de pdf
